department.en: Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 本堂課程旨在教授神經網路運作如何調控完整個體之知識。內容涵蓋神經細胞構造與運作、腦功能之生理基礎、神經科學之認知議題。期望藉由這門課程得以孕育出新世代腦科學領域之年輕研究人才。
goal.en: “The course aims to familiarize the students how the nervous system works to achieve all kind of functions. It will cover the workings of the brain, its molecules and cells, and the systems that underlie behavior.“

outline.ch:
“授課內容  1. Introduction : overview
2. The anatomical organization of the central nervous system
3. Molecular biology of the Neurons I
4. Molecular biology of the Neurons II
5. The anatomical and functional organization of motor system
6. The anatomical and functional organization of sensory system
7. Functional properties of sensorimotor cortex
8. Motor learning and Plasticity of adult brain
9. Visual system
10. Auditory system
11. mid-term exam
12. Olfactory system
13. High-level mental functions : Language
14. High-level mental functions : Memory and thought
15. High-level mental functions : Arousal and emotion
16. High-level mental functions : Sleep and dreaming
17. Disorders of Mood: Depression, mania and anxiety disorders
18. final exam“
